"If some of your friends don't appear in the contacts list, we recommend the following steps:"
"Make sure that your friend's phone number is in your address book"
Make sure that your friend is using WhatsApp Messenger
In your Android address book, make sure that all contact accounts (e.g. SIM, Google, Phone) are âvisibleâ or âviewableâ
In your Android address book, make sure that all contact groups (e.g. Friends, Family) are âvisibleâ or âviewableâ
We recommend that you make your contacts ânot visibleâ and then âvisibleâ to force a refresh. After doing this, launch WhatsApp > menu button > New > menu button > Refresh.
